nodes.id: 山东省济南市中级人民法院

zh-cn: 山东省济南市中级人民法院

location.zh-cn: 山东省济南市市中区经二路1号
location.en: No. 1 Jing'er Road, Shizhong District, Jinan City, Shandong Province

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国山东省济南市的中级人民法院。
description.en: The intermediate people's court of Jinan City, Shandong Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国山东省的最高审判机关。
description.en: The highest judicial organ in Shandong Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 济南市的地方国家权力机关。
description.en: The local organ of state power in Jinan City.

nodes.id: 济南市人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 济南市人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 济南市人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The standing committee of the Jinan Municipal People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中国共产党济南市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党济南市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在济南市的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Communist Party of China in Jinan City.

description.zh-cn: 山东省济南市中级人民法院的前身之一，成立于1949年。
description.en: One of the predecessors of the Jinan Intermediate People's Court, established in 1949.

description.zh-cn: 山东省人民政府的组成部门，主管全省司法行政工作。
description.en: A component department of the Shandong Provincial People's Government, in charge of judicial administration in the province.

description.zh-cn: 山东省济南市中级人民法院的前身之一，于1950年由济南直属市人民法院更名而来。
description.en: One of the predecessors of the Jinan Intermediate People's Court, renamed from Jinan Directly-affiliated Municipal People's Court in 1950.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国人民法院组织法

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国人民法院组织法
en: Organic Law of the People's Courts of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国关于人民法院组织体系、职权等方面的基本法律。
description.en: The basic law of the People's Republic of China concerning the organizational system and functions of the people's courts.

description.zh-cn: 一种政府机构改革中的做法，指两个或以上单位在同一地点共同办公，以整合资源、提高效率。
description.en: A practice in government institutional reform where two or more units share the same office space to integrate resources and improve efficiency.

nodes.id: 山东省青岛市中级人民法院

zh-cn: 山东省青岛市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国山东省青岛市的中级人民法院。
description.en: The intermediate people's court of Qingdao City, Shandong Province, People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 山东省淄博市中级人民法院

zh-cn: 山东省淄博市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国山东省淄博市的中级人民法院。
description.en: The intermediate people's court of Zibo City, Shandong Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年间，由毛泽东发动和领导的在中国大陆发生的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement in mainland China from 1966 to 1976, initiated and led by Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 原中华人民共和国安徽省副省长。
description.en: Former Vice Governor of Anhui Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 原中国人民政治协商会议安徽省委员会副主席。
description.en: Former Vice Chairman of the Anhui Provincial Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 北京首都国际机场的管理运营机构。
description.en: The management and operation entity of Beijing Capital International Airport.

description.zh-cn: 原首都机场集团公司董事长。
description.en: Former Chairman of Capital Airports Holding Company.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国山东省的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level state administrative organ of Shandong Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 一家曾与山东省人民政府发生行政复议诉讼的公司。
description.en: A company that was involved in an administrative reconsideration lawsuit with the Shandong Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国山东省济南市的一所综合性大学。
description.en: A comprehensive university located in Jinan, Shandong Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 曾因学位授予问题起诉济南大学的当事人。
description.en: A party who once sued the University of Jinan over a degree conferral issue.

description.zh-cn: 指2012年初王立军事件爆发后，牵扯出的一系列关于时任中共中央政治局委员、重庆市委书记薄熙来的事件，最终导致其被免职、调查并判刑。
description.en: Refers to a series of events concerning Bo Xilai, then a member of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee and Secretary of the Chongqing Municipal Committee, which were triggered by the Wang Lijun incident in early 2012, ultimately leading to his removal, investigation, and sentencing.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局委员、重庆市委书记。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, who served as a member of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee and Secretary of the Chongqing Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 一部网络小说系列，涉及版权纠纷。
description.en: A series of online novels involved in a copyright dispute.

description.zh-cn: 贵州茅台公司的注册商标，涉及商标维权案件。
description.en: A registered trademark of Kweichow Moutai Company, involved in trademark protection cases.

description.zh-cn: 台湾女歌手，其专辑曾涉及销售侵权案件。
description.en: A Taiwanese female singer whose albums have been involved in sales infringement cases.

description.zh-cn: 台湾女歌手，其专辑曾涉及销售侵权案件。
description.en: A Taiwanese female singer whose albums have been involved in sales infringement cases.

description.zh-cn: 原中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会副主席。
description.en: Former Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 原中华人民共和国安徽省人民政府副省长。
description.en: Former Vice Governor of the People's Government of Anhui Province, People's Republic of China.

description.en: The basic people's court of Licheng District, Jinan City, Shandong Province.

description.zh-cn: 山东省济南市长清区的基层人民法院。
description.en: The basic people's court of Changqing District, Jinan City, Shandong Province.

description.en: The basic people's court of Zhangqiu District, Jinan City, Shandong Province.

description.en: The basic people's court of Pingyin County, Shandong Province.

description.en: The basic people's court of Shanghe County, Shandong Province.

description.zh-cn: 山东省济阳区的基层人民法院。
description.en: The basic people's court of Jiyang District, Shandong Province.

nodes.id: 济南高新技术产业开发区人民法院

zh-cn: 济南高新技术产业开发区人民法院

description.zh-cn: 济南高新技术产业开发区的基层人民法院。
description.en: The basic people's court of Jinan High-tech Industrial Development Zone.

relationships.source: 山东省济南市中级人民法院
relationships.target: 山东省高级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 山东省济南市中级人民法院的上诉法院和业务上级是山东省高级人民法院。
description.en: The appellate court and professional superior of the Jinan Intermediate People's Court is the Shandong High People's Court.

relationships.source: 山东省济南市中级人民法院
relationships.target: 济南市人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 山东省济南市中级人民法院的组织上级是济南市人民代表大会。
description.en: The organizational superior of the Jinan Intermediate People's Court is the Jinan Municipal People's Congress.

relationships.source: 山东省济南市中级人民法院
relationships.target: 济南市人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 山东省济南市中级人民法院的组织上级是济南市人民代表大会常务委员会。
description.en: The organizational superior of the Jinan Intermediate People's Court is the Standing Committee of the Jinan Municipal People's Congress.

relationships.source: 山东省济南市中级人民法院
relationships.target: 中国共产党济南市委员会

description.zh-cn: 山东省济南市中级人民法院接受中国共产党济南市委员会的领导。
description.en: The Jinan Intermediate People's Court is under the leadership of the Jinan Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.source: 山东省司法厅
relationships.target: 济南直属市人民法院

description.zh-cn: 1949年，山东省司法厅下设四个直属市人民法院，其中包括济南直属市人民法院。
description.en: In 1949, the Shandong Provincial Department of Justice established four directly-affiliated municipal people's courts, including the Jinan Directly-affiliated Municipal People's Court.

relationships.source: 济南直属市人民法院
relationships.target: 济南市人民法院

description.zh-cn: 1950年，山东省各级司法机构进行整编并更名，济南直属市人民法院更名为济南市人民法院。
description.en: In 1950, judicial bodies at all levels in Shandong Province were reorganized and renamed; the Jinan Directly-affiliated Municipal People's Court was renamed the Jinan Municipal People's Court.

relationships.source: 济南市人民法院
relationships.target: 山东省济南市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 1954年《中华人民共和国人民法院组织法》公布后，济南市人民法院被改为山东省济南市中级人民法院。
description.en: After the promulgation of the Organic Law of the People's Courts of the People's Republic of China in 1954, the Jinan Municipal People's Court was reformed into the Jinan Intermediate People's Court.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国人民法院组织法
relationships.target: 山东省济南市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 1954年，《中华人民共和国人民法院组织法》公布，山东省济南市中级人民法院正式成立。
description.en: In 1954, the Organic Law of the People's Courts of the People's Republic of China was promulgated, and the Jinan Intermediate People's Court was formally established.

relationships.source: 合署办公
relationships.target: 山东省济南市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 1958年，山东省济南市中级人民法院与市司法局合署办公。
description.en: In 1958, the Jinan Intermediate People's Court and the Municipal Bureau of Justice began operating from a joint office.

relationships.source: 合署办公
relationships.target: 山东省青岛市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 1958年，山东省青岛市中级人民法院与市司法局合署办公。
description.en: In 1958, the Qingdao Intermediate People's Court and the Municipal Bureau of Justice began operating from a joint office.

relationships.source: 合署办公
relationships.target: 山东省淄博市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 1958年，山东省淄博市中级人民法院与市司法局合署办公。
description.en: In 1958, the Zibo Intermediate People's Court and the Municipal Bureau of Justice began operating from a joint office.

relationships.source: 文化大革命
relationships.target: 山东省济南市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，山东省法院系统实行军管，中级人民法院成立公安机关军事管制委员会，正常审判工作中断。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, the court system in Shandong Province was placed under military control, and a military control commission of public security organs was established in the intermediate people's court, interrupting normal judicial work.

relationships.source: 山东省济南市中级人民法院
relationships.target: 王怀忠

description.zh-cn: 2003年，山东省济南市中级人民法院一审审理原安徽省副省长王怀忠案。
description.en: In 2003, the Jinan Intermediate People's Court conducted the first-instance trial of the case of Wang Huaizhong, former Vice Governor of Anhui Province.

relationships.source: 山东省济南市中级人民法院
relationships.target: 王昭耀

description.zh-cn: 2006年，山东省济南市中级人民法院一审审理原安徽省政协副主席王昭耀案。
description.en: In 2006, the Jinan Intermediate People's Court conducted the first-instance trial of the case of Wang Zhaoyao, former Vice Chairman of the Anhui Provincial CPPCC.

relationships.source: 李培英
relationships.target: 首都机场

relationships.source: 山东省济南市中级人民法院
relationships.target: 李培英

description.zh-cn: 2007年，山东省济南市中级人民法院一审审理原首都机场集团董事长李培英案。
description.en: In 2007, the Jinan Intermediate People's Court conducted the first-instance trial of the case of Li Peiying, former Chairman of Capital Airports Holding.

relationships.source: 鲁信面粉有限公司
relationships.target: 山东省人民政府

description.zh-cn: 2010年，鲁信面粉有限公司就行政复议案起诉山东省人民政府，由济南市中级人民法院审理。
description.en: In 2010, Luxin Flour Co., Ltd. sued the Shandong Provincial People's Government over an administrative reconsideration case, which was heard by the Jinan Intermediate People's Court.

relationships.source: 杨永智
relationships.target: 济南大学

description.zh-cn: 2012年，杨永智起诉济南大学不履行授予学士学位法定职责，由济南市中级人民法院审理。
description.en: In 2012, Yang Yongzhi sued the University of Jinan for failing to perform its statutory duty of conferring a bachelor's degree, a case heard by the Jinan Intermediate People's Court.

relationships.source: 薄熙来事件
relationships.target: 薄熙来

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来事件导致薄熙来被免职、调查并最终被判刑。
description.en: The Bo Xilai incident led to Bo Xilai's dismissal, investigation, and eventual sentencing.

relationships.source: 山东省济南市中级人民法院
relationships.target: 薄熙来

description.zh-cn: 2013年，山东省济南市中级人民法院一审审理薄熙来案。
description.en: In 2013, the Jinan Intermediate People's Court conducted the first-instance trial of the Bo Xilai case.

relationships.source: 山东省济南市中级人民法院
relationships.target: 鬼吹灯

description.zh-cn: 2013年，济南市中级人民法院审理某网站违法提供《鬼吹灯2》有偿下载案，保护了该作品的知识产权。
description.en: In 2013, the Jinan Intermediate People's Court tried a case against a website for illegally providing paid downloads of 'Ghost Blows Out the Light 2', thereby protecting the intellectual property of the work.

relationships.source: 山东省济南市中级人民法院
relationships.target: 茅台

description.zh-cn: 2013年，济南市中级人民法院审理贵州茅台公司“茅台”商标维权案，保护了其商标权。
description.en: In 2013, the Jinan Intermediate People's Court tried a trademark protection case for Kweichow Moutai Company's 'Moutai' trademark, protecting its trademark rights.

relationships.source: 山东省济南市中级人民法院
relationships.target: 张惠妹

description.zh-cn: 2013年，济南市中级人民法院审理某商场违法销售张惠妹专辑案，保护了其权益。
description.en: In 2013, the Jinan Intermediate People's Court tried a case against a mall for illegally selling A-Mei's albums, thereby protecting her rights.

relationships.source: 山东省济南市中级人民法院
relationships.target: 田馥甄

description.zh-cn: 2013年，济南市中级人民法院审理某商场违法销售田馥甄专辑案，保护了其权益。
description.en: In 2013, the Jinan Intermediate People's Court tried a case against a mall for illegally selling Hebe Tien's albums, thereby protecting her rights.

relationships.source: 山东省济南市中级人民法院
relationships.target: 苏荣

description.zh-cn: 2016年，山东省济南市中级人民法院一审审理原全国政协副主席苏荣案。
description.en: In 2016, the Jinan Intermediate People's Court conducted the first-instance trial of the case of Su Rong, former Vice Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee.

relationships.source: 山东省济南市中级人民法院
relationships.target: 周春雨

description.zh-cn: 2019年，山东省济南市中级人民法院一审审理原安徽省人民政府副省长周春雨案。
description.en: In 2019, the Jinan Intermediate People's Court conducted the first-instance trial of the case of Zhou Chunyu, former Vice Governor of the Anhui Provincial People's Government.

relationships.source: 山东省济南市历下区人民法院
relationships.target: 山东省济南市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 山东省济南市历下区人民法院是山东省济南市中级人民法院下辖的基层人民法院。
description.en: The Lixia District People's Court of Jinan City is a basic people's court under the jurisdiction of the Jinan Intermediate People's Court.

relationships.source: 山东省济南市市中区人民法院
relationships.target: 山东省济南市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 山东省济南市市中区人民法院是山东省济南市中级人民法院下辖的基层人民法院。
description.en: The Shizhong District People's Court of Jinan City is a basic people's court under the jurisdiction of the Jinan Intermediate People's Court.

relationships.source: 山东省济南市槐荫区人民法院
relationships.target: 山东省济南市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 山东省济南市槐荫区人民法院是山东省济南市中级人民法院下辖的基层人民法院。
description.en: The Huaiyin District People's Court of Jinan City is a basic people's court under the jurisdiction of the Jinan Intermediate People's Court.

relationships.source: 山东省济南市天桥区人民法院
relationships.target: 山东省济南市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 山东省济南市天桥区人民法院是山东省济南市中级人民法院下辖的基层人民法院。
description.en: The Tianqiao District People's Court of Jinan City is a basic people's court under the jurisdiction of the Jinan Intermediate People's Court.

relationships.source: 山东省济南市历城区人民法院
relationships.target: 山东省济南市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 山东省济南市历城区人民法院是山东省济南市中级人民法院下辖的基层人民法院。
description.en: The Licheng District People's Court of Jinan City is a basic people's court under the jurisdiction of the Jinan Intermediate People's Court.

relationships.source: 山东省济南市长清区人民法院
relationships.target: 山东省济南市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 山东省济南市长清区人民法院是山东省济南市中级人民法院下辖的基层人民法院。
description.en: The Changqing District People's Court of Jinan City is a basic people's court under the jurisdiction of the Jinan Intermediate People's Court.

relationships.source: 山东省济南市章丘市区人民法院
relationships.target: 山东省济南市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 山东省济南市章丘市区人民法院是山东省济南市中级人民法院下辖的基层人民法院。
description.en: The Zhangqiu District People's Court of Jinan City is a basic people's court under the jurisdiction of the Jinan Intermediate People's Court.
